specialRules: Endorsement and Specialty Licenses pay application and license fee together
Others can pay Application Fee upfront and License fee when approved

applicationTypes.renewalPeriod:
Expires Dec. 31st of every even # year. Regardless of when issued. - If faculty leaves job for any reason this license auto terminates.

Must provide verification that they are employed by a Vet college in Az. This verification can come from either the employer or employee. 

Transcript, all other items which apply to everyone else apply here. 

*Not required to take the State exam and not required to do CE

License is null if they stop working at the College (good faith inform)
applicationTypes.duration: 2 year once they go through 1st renewal

specialRules: Endorsement and Specialty Licenses pay application and license fee together
Others can pay Application Fee upfront and License fee when approved

applicationTypes.renewalPeriod:
Expires Dec. 31st of every even # year. Regardless of when issued. 

Own type of license (not a pathway) limits practice to scope of boarded specialty.
They do not have to pass National exam so no need to send scores. Must submit proof of current vet specialty in the form of a certificate and/or letter. They will need to upload this. 

They submit all other items similar to everyone else.
applicationTypes.duration: 2 year once they go through 1st renewal
applicationTypes.licenseNumberFormat:
4 Digit #:
Started with 8000 and runs through 8099

applicationTypes.applicationType: Temp Vet License (Bridge of time to getting regular)
applicationTypes.renewalPeriod:
30 Day license, cannot be extended, only used one time and is a separate application.
Temporary application is not accepted unless the applicant also submits another type of vet license application. 
No fee
Board staff must still verify licensure in another State in good standing. Govt. Issued ID, proof of legal entry into the Country.
applicationTypes.licenseNumberFormat: Currently follows the Vet license numbering because it stays with them when they go live with regular license.
